tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE marketing_campaign_performance_data (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    total_budget DECIMAL,
    total_impressions INT,
    total_clicks INT,
    total_conversions INT
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_performance_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  impressions INT,
  clicks INT,
  conversions INT,
  spend DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES marketing_campaigns(campaign_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CampaignPerformanceData (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT
);

CREATE TABLE CampaignMetrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    date DATE,
    cost DECIMAL,
    revenue DECIMAL,
    profit DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE CampaignPerformance (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT NOT NULL,
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT,
    spend DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES Campaigns(campaign_id)
);

CREATE TABLE AdGroups (
    ad_group_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT NOT NULL,
    ad_group_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    target_audience VARCHAR(255),
    bid DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES Campaigns(campaign_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Ads (
    ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_group_id INT NOT NULL,
    ad_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    ad_type VARCHAR(50),
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT,
    spend DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (ad_group_id) REFERENCES AdGroups(ad_group_id)
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE campaign_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT
)

CREATE TABLE marketing_channels (
    channel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    channel_name VARCHAR(255),
    channel_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE campaign_engagement (
    engagement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    date DATE,
    likes INT,
    comments INT
)

CREATE TABLE audience_segments (
    segment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    segment_name VARCHAR(255),
    segment_description TEXT,
    segment_size INT
)
